column5: Hi guys finally back.Unfortunately I did not have much time for OFC lately.  I am pleased to say my father came home from the hospital today after a 2 and a half month stay.  He had 2 surgerys one to clean out some arteries and another to repare an Aortic aneurysm.  All his operations have been successful now comes the long road to recovery.With alot of rest he will be absolutely A OK.I guess I can now resume fishing soon.      MTP
Thats good news.. my dad had that done as well.. its a long road back.
Good to hear all went well.
Glad to hear your dad pulled through.
Excellent news Mike. Very happy that all went well for your Dad.
Great to hear it went well.
Great news Mike     Glad your dad's back home and recovering Now get out there and catch some fish will ya
Give him plenty of hugs; if you have not already, and if you have, give em a few more. Ain't nothing better than a hug from your son!
thats great news mike and like what weeds said, give him a couple more hugs.......
Great to hear that Mike. My Dad is also on the road to recovery after similar procedures. It really puts life into perspective, doesn't it? Good luck to you both.
Hi Mike. Good to hear of your Dads journey back to health. Also good to see you post again !
That is good news. Always time to read a post like that.
Good to see you back Mike. I wish your Dad all the best in recovery! Someone has to be there to show your son how to fish; you can't leave it all up to Uncle Dan.
Great news Mike  Glad your dad's OK.
Welcome back Mike. I'm glad that your Dad is headed in the right direction.
That's wonderful news Mike, welcome back!
